comments.body: Thanks. It might be a nice addition to the API to be able to request this information directly. I also found this older thread that has some info, in case anyone else is researching this: https://forum-en.guildwars2.com/forum/community/api/How-to-test-if-a-temple-is-open

comments.author: Khisanth.2948
comments.body:
You want the events at http://wiki.guildwars2.com/wiki/Temple_of_Balthazar under “The Assault on the Temple of Balthazar” and “Defending the Temple of Balthazar”.

You need to check both the assault and defend events.

The events you listed aren’t related. The third one actually takes place in Cursed Shore.
